content: inspired by the woodland and the magical creatures the forest fairy hood was born a pixie hat that will look adorable on your little human simple stitches and braid-like texture create a beautiful outcome head size measurements newborn 13 33 cm 3-6 mo 14 -15 35 5-40 5 cm 6-12 mo 16 -17 41-45 5 cm 12-24 mo 17 -18 43-48 cm 2-5 years 18 -19 46-51 cm child 19 -20 48-53 cm please choose the best size for your child according to the head measurements and not the age as kid s heads tend to vary quite a bit in size yardage newborn mc 70-85 m 76-92 yds cc 50-60 m 54-65 yds 3-6 mo mc 95-110 m 103-120 yds cc 75-85 m 82-92 yds 6-12 mo mc 115-130 m 125-142 yds cc 95-105 m 103-114 yds 12-24 mo mc 130-145 m 142-158 yds cc 110-120 m 120-131 yds 2-5 yrs mc 150-165 m 164-180 yds cc 120-130 m 131-142 yds child mc 160-175 m 174-191 yds cc 130-140 m 142-153 yds
